overview: It's all about the Benjamins. Well, not really! In this unique disc, you'll get to know 50 Cent, the hip-hopper who's breaking all the rules and making up his own as he goes along. Included are probing interviews with Ed Lover and Mr. Cheeks, as well as never-before-seen film footage that tells the real story -- up close and personal -- of this extraordinarily unique performer. Definitely not spare change!
title: 50 Cent: Real Money
